entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
